scripts.dev: cross-env-file -p .env.dev.json concurrently --kill-others -n=svelte,electron -c='#ff3e00',blue "vite dev" "node electron.esbuild.config.mjs && electron resources/app/electron.mjs"
scripts.build:electron: npm run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.json electron-builder -w --config build.config.json
scripts.build:electron:beta: npm run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.beta.json electron-builder -w --config build.beta.config.json
scripts.build:electron:release: npm run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.json electron-builder -p always -w --config build.config.json
scripts.build:electron:release:beta: npm run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.beta.json electron-builder -p always -w --config build.beta.config.json
scripts.build: npm run pack:electron && npm run pack:vite && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:beta: npm run pack:electron:beta && npm run pack:vite:beta && npm run build:electron:beta
scripts.release: npm run release-it:release && npm run pack:electron && npm run pack:vite && npm run build:electron:release
scripts.release:beta: npm run release-it:release:beta && npm run pack:electron:beta && npm run pack:vite:beta && npm run build:electron:release:beta
